Name: Parallel Systems
Description: Autonomous, battery-electric rail system aiming to transition freight transportation from trucking to rail.
Founders: Ben Stabler, Brian Ignaut, John Howard, Matthew Soule
Early Metrics: Raised a total of $91.3M in equity funding, backed by Anthos Capital, Collaborative Fund, Congruent Ventures, Riot Ventures
Press: Raised $38M in a round to push forward autonomous electric rail system innovation, contributing to freight transportation sustainability and reduced carbon emissions.
